job_history.work_description: Managed and oversees the Finance Department of a charter airline which generated up to $4.2 million in gross revenues. Responsible for accounts payable, ADP payroll processing, multiple bank reconciliations, maintain general ledger, financial reporting and analysis, ad-hoc reporting, budget, cash management, handle monthly and year end accounting process; ensure accuracy and integrity of accounts.

Provided professional tax services to ensure accurate financial statements and tax compliance. Prepared and compiled financial information by preparing entries to general ledger accounts detailing assets, liabilities, and capital.

Managed overall operations and provided accounting and tax services to small/medium-sized businesses. Provided business management consulting. Handled accounting system setup and training, bookkeeping, account reconciliations and general ledger processing.
In Charge of accounting accounts from diverse industries such as retail, property management, and real estate, and specializing in construction industry
Performed general accounting functions, including the preparation and review of financial analysis and reports.

education.university: Pontifical Catholic University of Puerto Rico

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in financial reporting and analysis across various roles, including preparing financial statements and ad-hoc reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Has over 25 years of experience in general accounting functions, including preparing entries to general ledger accounts, account reconciliations, and general ledger processing, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled ADP payroll processing and payroll-related tasks in multiple roles, suggesting strong proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Managed budgeting responsibilities in multiple roles, including preparing financial information and handling cash management, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held leadership roles, including managing the Finance Department and overseeing accounting operations, suggesting strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in financial analysis, including preparing financial reports and performing ad-hoc reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Auditing
skills.explanation: Has experience as an auditor, handling accounting accounts from diverse industries, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Accounting System Setup
skills.explanation: Handled accounting system setup and training, suggesting strong proficiency in accounting system setup.

skills.name: Bookkeeping
skills.explanation: Handled bookkeeping tasks, including preparing entries to general ledger accounts, suggesting strong proficiency.
